name: Antidox
tag_list: soft-strategy, digital-strategy, strategic-consulting, internet-strategic-consulting, web-2-0, innovation, technologies, innovation-management, brand-content-management, storytelling, influence, strategic-planning, content-strategy, public-relations, publ
overview: Antidox, specialized in soft strategy, is a trusted advisor and counselor of CEOs and Communication or Marketing Directors of global organizations. Its core mission is to provide senior executives with a clear and new understanding of the trends and controversies that shape their environment and of their stakeholders (customers, public opinion, politicians, journalists, NGOs, competitors, scientists). Antidox is at the core of new thinking about social, consumer, marketing and strategic changes. We help our customer think out of the box and develop innovative business and communication strategies, especially using social medias and innovative research. Antidox provides knowledge, counsel and advice to Fortune 500 and CAC 40 corporations (energy, high-tech, health, insurance, and media). Antidox invests also in new tech ventures.
